QuestData.Title: The Sting of Learning
QuestData.Description: There are dangers in the pools. The latest and most vicious are the water pincers. A time has come for their numbers to be diminished, and I am no longer up to the task.$B$BIf you could clear out some of the water pincers, I would be very appreciative. Beware their numbers... sometimes it's best to lure them from the pool-side rather than wading all the way in.
QuestData.RewardText: The water pincers are strange creatures. They seem to be drawn to still water.
